title: Purchasing RP doesn't work?
body: When ever I try to Purchase RP it goes to a white screen that just has a loading symbol. I have no idea what to do and I've tried all the "solutions" but none of them have worked.

replies.body: Have you tried resetting your internet explorer config and then setting the security level to "low"?
Yeah I tried that, it didn't work :(

Hm... well there are some server issues atm. Before trying anything else I say you wait a day or two.

Reply to this message then and I'll help.
Same, I am experiencing this issue as well.
